data.message: Tried entering dozens of times tonight. All before the midnight deadline but website is not allowing me to enter.   Sooo disappointed.

replies.message: Same here! Got 4 bottles here and can't get onto the entry form!
I am having the same problem

Hi Simon, we're sorry to hear you were having problems entering your code. You still have the chance to win a holiday to your dream destination as there will be a bonus draw on 30/09/17. Please could you try clearing the cookies on your browser and then try longing in again. If you need any more help please call our team on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1), Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm, who will be happy to help.

Hi Jacquis, thanks for getting in touch. We'd suggest clearing the cookies on your browser and refreshing the page before trying to enter again, there is still a chance to win a holiday to your dream destination as part of our bonus draw on 30/09/17. If you need any more help, please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1). Thanks
Coca-Cola I did that. I wanted to enter the main competition but have had to settle for the bonus!
Hey Simon, we didn't hear from you. Please could you send us a private message with your email and the codes you were trying to enter, so that we look into this for you? Thanks
